data.lyric:
[ti:homecoming queen?]
[ar:Kelsea Ballerini]
[al:homecoming queen?]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]homecoming queen? - Kelsea Ballerini (凯尔西·巴莱里尼)
[00:07.25]Hey homecoming Queen
[00:09.89]Why do you lie
[00:11.66]When somebody's mean
[00:13.98]Where do you hide
[00:15.98]Do people assume
[00:17.95]You're always alright
[00:20.07]Been so good at smiling
[00:22.47]Most of your life
[00:24.98]Look d**n good in the dress
[00:28.15]Zipping up the mess
[00:30.22]Dancing with your best foot forward
[00:34.47]Does it get hard
[00:36.45]To have to play the part
[00:38.48]Nobody's feeling sorry for ya
[00:43.38]But what if I told you the world wouldn't end
[00:47.42]If you started showing what's under your skin
[00:52.00]What if you let 'em all in on the lie
[00:56.12]Even the homecoming Queen cries
[01:06.05]Hey homecoming Queen
[01:08.79]How's things at home
[01:10.56]Still walking on eggshells
[01:12.69]When that curtains closed
[01:14.84]Did your daddy teach you
[01:17.25]How to act tough
[01:19.07]Or more like your mama
[01:21.07]Sweep it under the rug
[01:23.65]Look d**n good in the dress
[01:27.11]Zipping up the mess
[01:29.19]Dancing with your best foot forward
[01:33.51]Did you want the crown
[01:35.35]Or does it weigh you down
[01:37.42]Nobody's feeling sorry for ya
[01:42.56]What if I told you the world wouldn't end
[01:46.31]If you started showing what's under your skin
[01:50.92]What if you let 'em all in on the lie
[01:55.01]Even the homecoming Queen cries
[01:59.12]Yeah what if I told you the sky wouldn't fall
[02:03.17]If you lost your composure said to hell with it all
[02:07.39]Not everything pretty sparkles and shines
[02:11.61]And even the homecoming Queen cries
[02:14.98]Ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh
[02:16.69]Oh yeah
[02:20.47]Even the homecoming Queen cries
[02:23.48]Ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh
[02:27.66]Ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh
[02:30.25]Hey homecoming Queen
[02:33.06]Why do you lie
[02:34.93]When somebody's mean
[02:37.05]Where do you hide
data.trans:
[ti:homecoming queen?]
[ar:Kelsea Ballerini]
[al:homecoming queen?]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:07.25]舞会女王
[00:09.89]你为何要说谎
[00:11.66]当别人对你指指点点时
[00:13.98]你究竟会躲到何处
[00:15.98]人们是否总是以为
[00:17.95]你温顺谦和
[00:20.07]真假难辨的笑容
[00:22.47]总是挂在你的脸上
[00:24.98]一袭长裙 衬得你光彩照人
[00:28.15]你把所有的不堪埋藏在心底
[00:30.22]无可挑剔的舞姿让你成为全场的焦点
[00:34.47]你是否感到苦不堪言
[00:36.45]你必须扮演完美无瑕的角色
[00:38.48]特别是无人同情你的遭遇时
[00:43.38]如果我告诉你这个世界不会覆灭 那你会怎样
[00:47.42]如果你慢慢坦露心声 展现真我
[00:52.00]如果你让他们知道真相
[00:56.12]即使是舞会女王也会伤心难过
[01:06.05]舞会女王
[01:08.79]家里怎么样
[01:10.56]你依然如履薄冰
[01:12.69]当你拉上窗帘
[01:14.84]你的爸爸是否会教导你
[01:17.25]如何假装坚强
[01:19.07]或者你像你的妈妈一样
[01:21.07]对一切视而不见
[01:23.65]一袭长裙 衬得你光彩照人
[01:27.11]你把所有的不堪埋藏在心底
[01:29.19]无可挑剔的舞姿让你成为全场的焦点
[01:33.51]你是否渴望拥有那顶王冠
[01:35.35]是否让你感觉不堪重负
[01:37.42]没有人会同情你
[01:42.56]如果我告诉你这个世界不会覆灭 那你会怎样
[01:46.31]如果你慢慢坦露心声 展现真我
[01:50.92]如果你让他们知道真相
[01:55.01]即使是舞会女王也会伤心难过
[01:59.12]如果我告诉你天空不会塌陷 那你会怎样 
[02:03.17]如果你不再压抑自己 哪怕放纵一次也好
[02:07.39]不是所有美好的事物都要闪闪发光
[02:11.61]即使是舞会女王也会伤心难过
[02:14.98]//
[02:16.69]//
[02:20.47]即使是舞会女王也会伤心难过
[02:23.48]//
[02:27.66]//
[02:30.25]舞会女王
[02:33.06]你为何要说谎
[02:34.93]当别人对你指指点点时
[02:37.05]你究竟会躲到何处
